items.gpt_title: Assumptions Regarding User/Administrator Behavior
items.carel_description: A process shall be employed to create product user documentation that describes: b) assumptions regarding the behavior of the user/administrator and their relationship to the secure operation of the product.
items.gpt_description: This requirement focuses on identifying and documenting assumptions about the behavior of users and administrators as they relate to the secure operation of the product. It emphasizes understanding how user actions can affect security and ensuring that these assumptions are clearly communicated and managed within the security guidelines.

key_aspects.description: Identify and document the expected behaviors of users and administrators that are critical for maintaining the security of the product. This includes assumptions about their adherence to security policies and procedures.
key_aspects.all: {"aspect":"Behavioral Assumptions","details":"Identify and document the expected behaviors of users and administrators that are critical for maintaining the security of the product. This includes assumptions about their adherence to security policies and procedures."}

key_aspects.description: Understand and communicate how deviations from these assumed behaviors could potentially impact the security posture of the product, including potential vulnerabilities that may be introduced.
key_aspects.all: {"aspect":"Impact on Security","details":"Understand and communicate how deviations from these assumed behaviors could potentially impact the security posture of the product, including potential vulnerabilities that may be introduced."}

key_aspects.description: Ensure that these assumptions are clearly articulated to all relevant stakeholders, including users, administrators, and security personnel, to facilitate awareness and compliance.
key_aspects.all: {"aspect":"Communication","details":"Ensure that these assumptions are clearly articulated to all relevant stakeholders, including users, administrators, and security personnel, to facilitate awareness and compliance."}

key_aspects.description: Integrate these behavioral assumptions into the overall security guidelines of the product, providing clear instructions and recommendations for maintaining secure operation.
key_aspects.all: {"aspect":"Guideline Integration","details":"Integrate these behavioral assumptions into the overall security guidelines of the product, providing clear instructions and recommendations for maintaining secure operation."}
